html:
6.24.21  12:25 am   How does one keep creativity flowing?

      try something a little different

6.23.21  10:46 pm   why do you post things on the internet? do not misunderstand me I am very glad you do post things on the internet but what is the reason?

      so you can see and hear them

6.23.21  7:58 pm   where do you get the motivation to make music?

      i usually get it when i'm going from place to place, OR staying in the same place

6.23.21  7:57 pm   do you think the whole flat earth thing is a scam 

      more of a scheme

6.23.21  6:20 pm   What question did daimien maymdien skip

      how are you

6.23.21  3:17 pm   I feel like I keep forcing myself to be inspired when making music, and that usually results in either something I don't like, or something that sounds really similar to another artists song. Any advice for coming up with original ideas without this happening?

      you could try flipping out

6.23.21  2:15 pm   How to concentrate?

      first figure out what you're concentrating on, and why

6.23.21  1:18 pm   I'm starting learning music. Circle of fifths interests me, and I know it's fundamental for everything in music, but it's hard to memorize. Any advice how to learn it effectively? 

      you'll automatically learn it as you go through life. You'll automatically notice the relationship that F has to C. then one day you will be casually minding your own business and then you will suddenly notice that the relationship from C to G is the same as the relationship from F to C. then hopefully your mind will be blown and then you will find an instrument and see how far the train goes

6.23.21  12:50 pm   where do babies come from

      larger babies. or, a smaller baby, if you are interested in getting into the Guiness Book of World Records

6.23.21  12:49 pm   When's the next song dropping

      when you least expect

6.23.21  12:46 pm   You use very clear diction when singing, is this an intentional choice or is that just how your voice is?

      the only reason i do that is just so people can understand what words i'm using

6.23.21  11:31 am   How to concentrate?

      figure out what you really care about

6.23.21  9:55 am   what happened to your 'cajones' you had for the 'money' video?

      turned to butter. i am now made of butter

6.23.21  9:41 am   How to continue without trying to make it sound good with no expectations?

      science is offering a 2500 dollar reward if you can make something bad and prove it's bad. so you could go for that

6.23.21  6:21 am   Wanna try do a 222bpm song

      sure but it's just gonna turn into 111

6.23.21  4:22 am   whens the next song

      doing it now

6.22.21  11:41 pm   can i go outside

      yes but you'll have to find the walls first

6.22.21  8:09 pm   Your music is incredibly complex, so my question is how do you make a decision about any one aspect of a song?

     i don't know

     It seems like some of those decisions would have options that would create two very different yet equally interesting experiences that seem impossible to compare. How do you compare them? Do you?

     sometimes i try a little of both. But what usually happens is neither of them work

6.22.21  7:22 pm   what's your favorite thing about your next song?

      how it goes

6.22.21  7:00 pm   why do people judge others?

     to try to figure out who they are

      is this bad? 

      it's definitely not perfect

6.22.21  6:10 pm   should i start writing in all lowercase on the internet

      sure

6.22.21  3:44 pm   how do airplanes do?

      not sure

6.22.21  1:57 pm   I relate "long, long, long journey", with "and the day goes on". Why?

      they share 2 topics: journeys, and the day

6.22.21  1:47 pm   whats the point of life

      to upset the previous status quo, of lifelessness

6.22.21  1:35 pm   Is the word "the" in your next song?

      yes

6.22.21  12:14 pm   who is your favourite character in lord of the rings? 

      it's a tie, between the lord and the rings

6.22.21  12:13 pm   How many times is the game supposed to change?

      as many times as you play, which is also the number of times that it stays the same

6.22.21  11:59 am   What is a song

     not sure

      and why do you make it good

      maybe as some kind of a fake out strategy

6.22.21  11:33 am   what should i name my houseplant

      see what it names you first

6.22.21  11:13 am   Is there a bad song?

      every song is bad

6.22.21  10:02 am   Hi Bill! Aaron Boone here, manager of the New York Yankees. We've got a big series against the Royals coming up, so I'm looking for any tips or suggestions for the team you might have. I'm a big fan and I think your advice could be the edge we need against Kansas City tonight.

      the winning team will be whichever one loves baseball the most. so in that sense, it's a loving contest really

6.22.21  5:06 am   why can't i sleep

      because everything is too ridiculous

6.22.21  12:16 am   how do you teach teens how to have their own opinions

      you could do a door-to-door campaign

6.22.21  12:15 am   what is a question on this page that you've thought about a lot, even long after you've answered it?

      how are you

6.21.21  11:26 pm   how do I stay interesting?

      sometimes you have to become uninteresting for a while and then go back to being interesting

6.21.21  11:12 pm   What's been the struggle with the song you're working on now? 

      making it too good

6.21.21  10:34 pm   How does one go about evaluating the meaning of art?

      tell someone else the location of the art. in that process, you will be tricked into saying which art it is. and from the there the floodgates are pretty much opened

6.21.21  9:40 pm   my mix sounds real balanced when low, but vocals over instrumental just feels weird in low volume, any idea why?

      might need a compressor

6.21.21  8:17 pm   why do you not sleep 

      usually due to being asleep, some other time before

6.21.21  7:53 pm   If you had to choose one, What genre would you consider your music to be?

      regular

6.21.21  7:39 pm   thoughts on constantly restarting something

      sometimes you need to take it a step further and restart the restarting process

6.21.21  5:20 pm   do you think making the history videos influenced your music (songwriting, production, choosing what song to release next, etc)?

      i made a lot of new crazy synth sounds for the history videos, which i ended up using in the songs also. which is why the sounds have names like 'pope phone', or 'made a mess'

6.21.21  3:59 pm   Is there a mention and/or an appearance of the chair in your next song?

      no

6.21.21  12:01 pm   Has anything interesting happened in South America yet?

      yes

6.21.21  10:31 am   what are you working on right now?

      a song of music, which should also have a music video to go with it

6.21.21  8:10 am   Are you still too small for the mall?

      what the heck is a mall

6.21.21  6:16 am   How do you choose what visuals go with the song? 

      i usually make the wrong decision, probably because the pressure of making the right decision is so intense that i may have blocked it out

6.21.21  3:43 am   did you get any advice from Bob Marley?

      yes and no

6.21.21  2:00 am   I keep getting bored of my art - How do I unlock the part of me that will help me make the weird art of my dreams?

      have you thought about going to the direct center of outer space

6.21.21  1:02 am   How do you defeat perfectionism and actually put the thing out?

      there's 2 ways. you can either panic more so you go faster, or panic less so that you can slowly learn how to move fast calmly
